name: Galaxy Annihilation
description: Galaxy Annihilation is a shoot'em up where we need to protect the planet earth from an impending alien attack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 8 - 10 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core E2220 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9500 GT or Radeon HD 6450 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 8 - 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7300 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 610 or Radeon HD 4650 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
